post.body: what a good idea- Mark's tourism show- best places to visit and play- did I say we had wineries- dozens of them..tastings- hic
snorkeling is great- they have a dive wreck for scuba people as well- I feel for all you people stuck in snow- fun for a visit
for the surfers - Margaret river and Yallingup are a short distance away - world class surfing events held there
around the coast a little way we have some rocky coastline and big surf for the surfers, we are in a big sheltered bay
no sharks, white sandy beaches, I mean WHITE sandy beaches - did a world trip last year saw lots beaches not many white sand
tourism, really long jetty out into ocean, approx 2 km, underwater observatory, caves, fishing, sailing, skydiving, crabs,
Bussselton, south west of Western Australia, sea side, mediterranean climate, wine growing, fruit, vegies, cattle, dairy
hi to Canada from a beautful day in Busselton again - must get a few final things from the shops now to beat the xmas bedlam
the same quantity of grass or vegies - saves money in the long run - glad you liked info
manual - besides getting the juice out well, being slow unlike most juicers no heat, better juice for you and much more from
you really need a juicer that is a bit like the old wringer on grandmas washing machine - it squeezes out the juice electric or
thank you for your kind words easy to grow wheatgrass really just need to get a system - juicing requires a special juicer tho
yes cheers........burp .....that was a luverly idea ....hic
the letter E
get the book read it and get him to read it as well somehow - not panacea, but will def help realtionship by understanding
tks for kind thoughts I just realised it was 21 dec longest day of year so thought we should celebrate with a night cap- cheers
have you or he read John Gray - Men are from Mars, Women are from Venus?
outside both ways 4pm here the garden call but............ twittersville is alluring.... must go xmas cleanup - kids coming home
thank you to all my new followers, must go and get this shopping done, so see you later on
Hi to all my new followers - it is getting near my bedtime here in Busselton - a few more emails to get done then off to a well earned sleep
